<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Shambler Troop](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1376)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This shuffling mass of decaying flesh moves with dull but singular focus.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Shambler Troop](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1376)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Troop" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=367" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 302</row>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +0

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A shambler troop is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 90
(16 squares)

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, positive 5, slashing 5, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 2

**[Troop Defenses](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=44)** 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet; troop movement

**Shambling Onslaught** <actions string="Single Action to Two Actions" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The shamblers lash out at any enemies in their squares or within 5 feet (DC 18 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The damage depends on the number of actions. <actions string="Single Action" /> 2d6+5 bludgeoning damage <actions string="Two Actions" /> 2d6+9 bludgeoning damage

**Grave Tide**   The shambler troop is less organized than most troops. It can move into other creatures' spaces, and other creatures can move into its spaces. Its spaces are difficult terrain to other creatures.

**[Form Up](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=43)** <actions string="Single Action" />  

**Troop Movement**   Whenever a troop Strides, it first [Forms Up](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=43) as a free action to condense into a 20-foot-by–20-foot area (minus any missing squares), then moves up to its Speed. This works just like a Gargantuan creature moving; for instance, if any square of the troop enters difficult terrain, the extra movement cost applies to the whole troop.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-103" />
name: Shambler Troop
